label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_010
content:
## 2026-01-12 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /zone-transfers: REQUESTS req | p50: 560ms p95: 1290ms p99: N/A | err: 1.9% (1 errors) | success: 98.1%
- /ixfr-requests: REQUESTS req | p50: 560ms p95: 1290ms p99: N/A | err: 0.8% (2 errors) | success: 99.2%
- /ttl-changes: REQUESTS req | p50: 560ms p95: 1290ms p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /propagation: REQUESTS req | p50: 74s p95: 178s p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /dns-queries: QPS avg: 21600 | peak: 51000 | nx_domain: 2.1% | servfail: 0.06% | udp: 96.6% | tcp_fallback: 1.6%
- /dnssec-signing: zones signed: 62 | signing queue depth: 2 | signature refreshes: 123 | ds mismatch: 0 | bogus validation events: 2
- /health-checks: authoritative reachability: 99.98% | SOA serial mismatch: 1 | lame delegations: 0
- /change-mgmt: requests: 5 | applied: 5 | failed: 0 | mean apply time: 20 min
- /cache-behavior: resolver cache hit: 87.6% | negative cache hit: 40.2% | prefetch enabled: 74.0%
- /latency: auth response avg: 18.7ms | p95: 45.6ms | EDNS0 present: 72.8%
- /errors: format errors: 11 | refused: 30 | rate limited: 15 | truncation TC: 0.7%
- /capacity: zones: 576 | records: 2,041,500 | dynamic updates/hr: 340

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 36% | Mem 64% | Disk 74% | Conns: 1340 | Net: 92/125 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 28% | Mem 54% | Disk 56% | Conns: 1145 | Net: 72/88 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 56% | Mem 71% | Disk 50% | Conns: N/A | Net: 110/145 Mbps | Queue depth: 6
- signer-01: CPU 42% | Mem 76% | Disk 61% | Conns: N/A | Net: 20/22 Mbps | HSM slot utilization: 62%

### Connection Pools
- pool-name: active 0 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 0 | avg_wait: 0ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 87.6% | Bandwidth: N/A | Origin requests: N/A

### Alerts
- [INFO] TSIG algorithm standardization completed on hostname: remaining zones
- [INFO] Dynamic update frequency reduced to 180s in internal tooling
- [INFO] SOA serial reconciliation job completed; one zone manually bumped
- [INFO] Alert thresholds for signer queue depth updated

### Deployments & Changes
- Standardized TSIG algorithms across remaining zones; confirmed transfer success rates recovered
- Reduced dynamic update frequency from 60s to 180s; propagation p95 improved
- Ran SOA serial reconciliation; manually bumped one zone
- Updated alert thresholds for signer queue depth during update storm

### Events
- Post-incident cleanup: standardized TSIG algorithms across remaining zones; confirmed transfer success rates recovered
- Reduced dynamic update frequency in internal tooling from 60s to 180s where acceptable; saw queue depth and propagation p95 improve
- Ran SOA serial reconciliation job; only one zone required manual bump due to prior failed change set
- Updated alert thresholds for signer queue depth based on observed load patterns during update storm

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: T. Kowalski. 2 pages. 6 tickets. Status: Recovering; metrics trending back to baseline after configuration standardization
